h2_title: Yellow Wind Sage Boss Fight and Guide
content: He can now also perform huge retreating slashes, jumping over you and slashing downward as he flees to the other side of the arena. Don’t bother trying to parry the move or Immobilize him since you won’t be able to retaliate, and be ready for him to come back with a spinning air slash.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Wind_Sage.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Wind Sage', specifically from the subsection 'Yellow Wind Sage Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
He can now also perform huge retreating slashes, jumping over you and slashing downward as he flees to the other side of the arena. Don’t bother trying to parry the move or Immobilize him since you won’t be able to retaliate, and be ready for him to come back with a spinning air slash.
